short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Highlights best discounts for current search results.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Show the best discounts at a glance!

When you search for your item on Amazon, Amazon Discounts Helper will automatically calculate the savings on each item and show you the amount.

To further ease finding the best discounts, it will sort the existing results to show you the most discounted items first, followed by the rest in descending order.
